title: François Ludo
text:
François Ludo (4 March 1930 – 29 June 1992) was a French <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player.
Personal life.
Ludo was born in France and was of Polish descent. He was the uncle of the French footballer, and <a href="RC%20Lens">RC Lens</a> legend <a href="%C3%89ric%20Sikora">Éric Sikora</a>.
